attributes.action: Provide free public transport for MPs with a small decrease to the "Attendance Allowance"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to alleviate some of the criticisms of MP travel costs etc. reduce their Attendance Allowance by a small amount in exchange for free use of busses and trains. 

A bus & railcard would obviously need to be provided.

It may also have the added benefit of highlighting public transport problems to members the Commons, as well as reduce trafic congestion.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
